basic.description: In this seminar, objectives and course activities serve to support the Apprentice Teaching coursework and are repeated here. Teacher candidates meet as a seminar group for weekly ninety-minute sessions during the semester. FSU-Teach students enrolled in the five hour SMT 4945 must take this corequisite, variable credit seminar.
basic.subject: SMT
basic.title: Apprentice Teaching Seminar (FSU-Teach)

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: SMT 1043, SMT 1053, SMT 3100, and SMT 4301. Corequisite: SMT 4945.
